[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Precision Agriculture Support System (PASS) defines requirements for optimizing crop yield, resource management, and sustainability through data-driven decision-making.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: PASS supports real-time environmental monitoring, predictive analytics, and automated recommendations for precision agriculture.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: PASS integrates with IoT sensors, UAVs, GIS platforms, and external agricultural databases.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: PASS provides web-based and mobile dashboards for farmers, agronomists, and agricultural administrators.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: PASS operates with drones, sensors, weather stations, and cloud-based storage solutions.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: PASS supports REST APIs for seamless data exchange with analytics and decision-support systems.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: PASS uses secure HTTPS and MQTT protocols for data transmission between devices and cloud servers.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: PASS optimizes storage for large-scale environmental data, ensuring real-time retrieval and analysis.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: PASS operates continuously with scheduled maintenance and adaptive data refresh cycles.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: PASS configures for different farm sizes, crop types, and environmental conditions.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: PASS connects to weather forecasting platforms and market price databases for adaptive planning.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: PASS monitors soil conditions, weather, and crop health, offering predictive analytics for efficient farm management.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: Designed for farmers, agronomists, and agricultural analysts with basic to advanced technical expertise.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: PASS depends on stable IoT connectivity, accurate sensor data, and reliable external data sources.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: PASS requires operational IoT devices, GIS platforms, and integration with agricultural data standards.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: GIS: Geographic mapping for farm planning.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with soil sensors for moisture and nutrient tracking (REQ-FUNC-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall connect to weather stations for updates (REQ-FUNC-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall provide crop health analysis using drone-captured imagery (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall generate irrigation schedules from soil moisture data (REQ-DB-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The interface shall support multilingual access and offer guided user onboarding.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process field-level data within 5 seconds.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall support up to 1,000 concurrent users during peak usage.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The database shall securely store crop health data, soil metrics, and weather information.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The database shall support role-based access and historical data retrieval.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall adhere to modular architecture for scalability.
[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-002: The software shall comply with ISO 27001 standards for data security.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to agricultural data standards and meet GDPR requirements for user data privacy.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall dynamically scale for added devices, users, and log activities.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Validates analytics, modeling, and GDPR compliance.
[SEC] 5. References: GDPR, ISO 27001, and agricultural data standards.
